description: Just a couple of hundred metres from highway 102 lies a couple of wetlands which have two stacked loops of crushed gravel trails.  The vegetation and wildlife are typical of wetlands with lots of birds to spot and a family of beavers.  Great place to stretch your legs on a trip out of the city.
directions: Highway 102.  Exit 12 to Brookfield.  Turn towards Brookfield and turn right into parking lot by the wetlands
title: Brookfield Wetlands
